title: Ticket #3290: condor_shadow doesn't play well with mulitple SPOOL dirs
description:
The condor_shadow is hard coded to look at SPOOL, and provides no means to pass it the same of a schedd it should be associated with. The following config: 

  SPOOL = dir1
  SCHEDD.SPOOL = dir2

would result in the shadow looking in dir1 instead of the appropriate directory dir2. This is especially an issue if dir1 has never been setup with a schedd and is therefore missing the spool_version file.

The shadow needs a better means to track with its associated schedd. A better solution might be to remove the reliance on the SPOOL directory all together. Currently the reliance on the SPOOL directory seems to be tied to the File Transfer object.
